Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Akhom, ki maim`sirafa vahi de rahim tuhanu raba de bhai'a tom dara'unda ham ate guge pukara nu nahim sunade jadom unham nu dara'i'a jave
Ate jekara tere raba de azaba (saza) da ika bula vi unhannu d'uha jave tam uha kahina laganage ki ha'e! Sadi mari kisamata besaka asim zalima si

Ate asim ki'amata de dina inasafa di takari rakhange tam kise vi jiva te bhora vi zulama nahim hovega. Ate jekara ra'i de dane barabara vi kise da karama honvega tam asim usa nu pragata kara devange. Ate asim hisaba laina di bharapura takata rakhade ham
Ate asim musa ate haruna nu phurakana (saca ate jhutha vica pharaka karana vala) ate prakasa ate upadesa bakhasisa kite. Alaha tom darana vali'am la'i
Jihare binham dekhe apane raba tom darade hana ate uha ki'amata da bhai'a rakhana vale hana
Ate iha ika barakata vali cetavani hai jisa nu asim utari'a hai tam ki huna tusim isa nu jhuthala'unde ho
Ate asim isa tom pahilam ibarahima nu maraga darasana pradana kita. Asim usa nu cagi tar'ham janade si
Jadom usa ne apane pita ate apani kauma nu kiha ki iha kihari'am murati'am hana jinham ute tusim tike baithe ho
Unham ne kiha ki asim apane pi'u dadi'am nu inham di hi puja karade ho'e dekhi'a hai
Ibarahima ne kiha, ki besaka tusim ate tuhade pi'u dhade khul'hi gumarahi vica phase rahe
Unham ne kiha ki tusim sade kola saci'am galam li'a'e ho jam tusim makhaula kara rahe ho
Ibarahima ne kiha, sagom tuhada raba uha hai, jihara dharati ate akasam da palanahara hai ate jisa ne inham nu paida kita hai. Maim isa gala di gavahi dena vali'am vicom ham
Ate alaha di sahu, maim tuhadi'am murati'am de sabadha vica ika yojana banavanga jadom tusim ithe nahim hovauge
